long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Atera Dashboard Redirect extension will redirect you to the 'Atera Dashboard' page instead of the default 'Devices Page' since this is not currently an option with the stock platform.

Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=URzM_6-ySTk
